tasks.label: Validate Workspace
tasks.command: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const markers=['.collective','collective.config.json'];const hasMarker=markers.some(m=>fs.existsSync(path.join(cwd,m)));if(!hasMarker){console.log('⚠ Warning: You may have opened a subdirectory instead of the project root.');console.log('Expected markers: '+markers.join(', '));const parent=path.dirname(cwd);if(markers.some(m=>fs.existsSync(path.join(parent,m)))){console.log('→ Try opening: '+parent);}}else{console.log('✓ Workspace looks correct')}"

tasks.label: Start Docker Containers
tasks.command: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const mcp=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('.vscode/mcp.json'));if(mcp.servers.memory?.type==='sse'){console.log('Starting Docker containers...');require('child_process').exec('docker compose up -d --build',{stdio:'inherit'},(e,o)=>{if(e)console.error('Failed to start:',e);else{console.log('Waiting for health checks...');setTimeout(()=>{const http=require('http');let done=0;['3100','3101'].forEach(p=>http.get('http://localhost:'+p+'/health',r=>{if(++done===2)console.log('✓ MCP servers ready!')}).on('error',()=>console.log('Port '+p+' not ready')))},8000)}})}else{console.log('Local mode detected, skipping Docker auto-start')}"

tasks.label: Switch to Docker Mode
tasks.command: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('.vscode/mcp.docker.json', '.vscode/mcp.json'); console.log('Switched to Docker mode. Please reload VS Code.')"

tasks.label: Switch to stdio Mode
tasks.command: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('.vscode/mcp.stdio.json', '.vscode/mcp.json'); console.log('Switched to stdio mode. Please reload VS Code.')"

tasks.label: Start Memory Server (stdio)
tasks.command: cd .collective/memory-server && npm run build && MCP_TRANSPORT=stdio node dist/index.js

tasks.label: Start Gemini Bridge (stdio)
tasks.command: cd .collective/gemini-bridge && npm run build && MCP_TRANSPORT=stdio node dist/mcp-server.js

tasks.label: Validate TypeScript
tasks.command: cd .collective/memory-server && npm run validate && cd ../gemini-bridge && npm run validate

tasks.label: Full Setup (Fresh Clone)
tasks.command: node -e "const {platform} = require('os'); const {execSync, spawnSync} = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); if(platform() === 'win32') { const gitBash = ['C:/Program Files/Git/bin/bash.exe', 'C:/Program Files (x86)/Git/bin/bash.exe'].find(p => fs.existsSync(p)); if(gitBash) { spawnSync(gitBash, ['-c', './setup.sh'], {stdio:'inherit'}); } else { console.error('Git Bash not found. Install Git for Windows first.'); process.exit(1); } } else { execSync('bash setup.sh', {stdio:'inherit'}); }"
